backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, portfolios, holdings, and Yahoo Finance HTTP outcalls with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light and dark color schemes and shared layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling hash-based routing, authentication states, and theme switching for public vs authenticated views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/charts/Allocatio: Donut chart showing portfolio allocation based on holdings with live quotes and graceful empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/charts/Performan: Line chart displaying historical performance for a selected asset with range selection and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with responsive sidebar handling and top navigation, adjusting sidebar visibility based on screen size.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Displays portfolios with live metrics, allows navigation, and includes a dialog for creating new portfolios.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with sidebar toggle, ticker search, theme switcher, and portfolio dropdown.
frontend/src/components/market/LastUpdat: Shows how many seconds ago market data was updated, refreshing every second.
frontend/src/components/market/MobileTic: Mobile-friendly dialog for searching and selecting ticker symbols using a typeahead input.
frontend/src/components/market/TickerTyp: A debounced ticker search input with keyboard navigation and a dropdown of live search results.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AddEdi: Modal for adding or editing a holding with ticker selection, share and cost inputs, and form validation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Create: Dialog for creating a new portfolio with name input and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Delete: Confirmation dialog that triggers a portfolio deletion mutation and navigates home on success.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Holdin: Displays and filters portfolio holdings with metrics, search, and optional price overrides, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Shows a portfolio summary card with value, daily change, return metrics, and a sparkline, navigating to the portfolio on click.
Allows toggling portfolio public visibility and provides a copyable public URL when enabled.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Remove: Confirmation dialog for removing a holding by calling a mutation and showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/theme/PublicThem: Theme provider that forces light mode for public-facing screens.
frontend/src/hooks/actorReady.ts: Polls React Query for an available actor instance and errors out if unavailable or failing within a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value with a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and cache live quotes and crypto IDs using actor APIs, handling both crypto and Yahoo data sources.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolioSimulatio: Manages simulation state for portfolio price changes, including toggles, overrides, and resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on portfolios and holdings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Stores and toggles light/dark theme with persistence in localStorage and DOM class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark CSS variables and base styling, including overflow prevention.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioMath.ts: Computes holding and portfolio metrics strictly from live quotes, including market value, returns, and daily changes.
frontend/src/lib/simulationQuotes.ts: Generates simulated quotes based on overrides or global moves, falling back to live quotes only when no simulation applies.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Provides crypto ID mappings and utilities to parse Yahoo and crypto responses for quotes, search, and historical data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Fetches portfolios and live quotes to render the dashboard, showing loading skeletons and portfolio cards.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Renders the main portfolio detail view with live/simulated quotes, metrics, charts, and holding management modals. Handles loading, missing portfolio states, and simulation controls.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPortfolioPage.t: Displays a read-only public portfolio with live/simulated quotes, metrics, and charts. Handles loading, access errors, and simulation mode without edit features.
frontend/src/pages/TickerPreviewPage.tsx: Shows a single asset’s current quote and 30‑day chart using live and historical data. Determines crypto vs stock and provides simple navigation back.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides a helper to format numbers as signed USD strings with two decimal places.
frontend/src/utils/textSearch.ts: Implements text normalization and case‑insensitive substring matching for search.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across normal and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, screens, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s state, features, requirements, and architectural notes regarding crypto data fallback behavior.
